text:
💡 What do we know about #immunity to #COVID19 after vaccination?

Prof Deborah Dunn-Walters @beecellnumbers, Chair of our #COVID19 & #Immunology Taskforce, calls for robust monitoring of the #vaccine rollout to uncover vital questions @guardian 👉https://t.co/LtQunJkUxo https://t.co/c0uTHDZBLX
